https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/u1k4R64qhezeMhfr6Lxq61WHSFV.jpg Lovesick Charlie Brown hopes – still – to get a valentine from the Little Red-Haired Girl, as does Sally from Linus, Lucy from Schroeder and Peppermint Patty from Charlie Brown. A Charlie Brown Valentine
